mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.CO_PERSONAL_ID as coPersonalId, a.COUNTRY as country, a.CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE as contactNumberType, a.CONTACT_NUMBER as contactNumber, a.FOUNDING_COUNTRY as foundingCountry, a.STATUS as status, a.EXCHANGE as exchange, a.CODE as code, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CO_PERSONAL_ID , COUNTRY , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE , CONTACT_NUMBER , FOUNDING_COUNTRY , STATUS , EXCHANGE , CODE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{coPersonalId} , #{country} , #{contactNumberType} , #{contactNumber} , #{foundingCountry} , #{status} , #{exchange} , #{code} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{coPersonalId} ,
COUNTRY = #{country} ,
CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{contactNumberType} ,
CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber} ,
FOUNDING_COUNTRY = #{foundingCountry} ,
STATUS = #{status} ,
EXCHANGE = #{exchange} ,
CODE = #{code} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , CO_PERSONAL_ID , COUNTRY , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE , CONTACT_NUMBER , FOUNDING_COUNTRY , STATUS , EXCHANGE , CODE , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.coPersonalId} , #{item.country} , #{item.contactNumberType} , #{item.contactNumber} , #{item.foundingCountry} , #{item.status} , #{item.exchange} , #{item.code} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{item.coPersonalId} , COUNTRY = #{item.country} , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{item.contactNumberType} , CONTACT_NUMBER = #{item.contactNumber} , FOUNDING_COUNTRY = #{item.foundingCountry} , STATUS = #{item.status} , EXCHANGE = #{item.exchange} , CODE = #{item.code} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , CO_PERSONAL_ID = #{coPersonalId} , COUNTRY = #{country} , CONTACT_NUMBER_TYPE = #{contactNumberType} , CONTACT_NUMBER = #{contactNumber} , FOUNDING_COUNTRY = #{foundingCountry} , STATUS = #{status} , EXCHANGE = #{exchange} , CODE = #{code} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_CONTACT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
